name: GUI's Reflection
description:
GUI's Reflection is a beautiful platformer where in all levels, you're reflected in the bottom, also the objects that are surrounding you, including the truth about those.

Made by RetroGamer for BiggsGames 2 Day Game Jam.

A-D / Right-Left Arrow keys | Horizontal Movement

W / Up ArrowKey  / Spacebar / J | Jump 

W-S / Up-Down ArrowKeys / Move in Menu

Enter / Space| Selection

BackSpace | Return to Menu

There are only 10 levels to play due to lack of time, but anyway, the goal was to test the mechanic concept. When you complete a level, a "medal" will appear in the menu, the type of medal depends on whether you died or not.

Song Reflection by Glitch
